title: 820-3330 Freezes During iSight/Camera "QTKit" Test?
message:
Repaired an 820-3330 that now has an usual issue; it freezes during the "QTKit" iSight Camera test. Freezes every single time on this exact test; tried several test assemblies, and confirmed the issue is 100% board-related (i.e. other boards in the same test assemblies do not freeze, etc). Tried both USB ports and multiple USB drives of ASD to be sure. Eliminated all of those and am confident the issue is board-related.

The camera itself DOES work in OS, and board works fine otherwise. I'm inclined to send it off as is, but I try to make sure all tests pass without issues. Any idea where I should start? Diode readings all match a working board, and the camera does work. Tried the obvious PRAM/SMC resets, of course.

All help appreciated--thanks in advance!

title: 820-3330 Freezes During iSight/Camera "QTKit" Test?
message: Test the machine few days and forget about ASD, if no issues appear...

title: 820-3330 Freezes During iSight/Camera "QTKit" Test?
message: Yeah I agree with 2informaticos could be nothing to worry about.
